short_summary: Supply, delivery, and installation of one dissecting microscope and camera system for laboratory use at the Canada Centre for Inland Waters (CCIW) in Burlington, ON.
description: The supplied dissecting microscope and camera system must include all computer parts, equipment, software, and manuals required for control and optimization of the system to examine and photograph (still and videos) small freshwater invertebrates (approx. size range 0.2-30 mm).
